text:
How do you like my in¬
visible ink?
4/21/64
MLM
Dear Mary Lynn,
In going through the NL file for
April 1963i the other day, I came across
these. It occurred to me that HEH used to keep a
file on regional meetings etc. - and the reports
from same. If he still does, perhaps these should
go in there, as perhaps the only existing record
of what was done at the region II meet last year.
If he doesn't, or if you already have a report,
please throw away.
Enjoyed Jim's note. He'll become a railfan yet.
If the current weather here continues, next time
he can come to the Midwest by ship—right through
Ohio, Indiana, etc. You should've seen Dotty yes¬
terday morning, poor gal. She took one look at the
basement, where there was about 4, 5, or 6 inches
of water, and she took off shoes and socks and
waded in to save the brochures, letterheads, etc.
We lost some but not all that much. And we thought
this basement was SAFE. It was supposed to be the
other one that leaked. However, it's understandable
When I drove home yesterday, all the sewers were
making like fountains. One of the main streets
here, Neil, is a main U.S. highway, and it was
closed yesterday morning...Lake Neil, it was
called. Some guy who runs a boating goods store
on the street was out giving free boat rides etc.
